iep_goals: Remain focused on academic tasks for 30-minute periods without redirection in 7 out of 10 trials
Complete and submit assignments by due dates with no more than 2 reminders in 8 out of 10 opportunities
accommodations: Frequent movement breaks during long classes
Use of fidget tools and noise-canceling headphones
Assignment due date reminders and organizational support
Preferential seating away from high-traffic areas
learning_styles: responds well to visual schedules and checklists

interviews.parent: Parent reports Jordan is creative and intelligent but struggles with organization and following through on tasks.
interviews.teacher: Jordan contributes great ideas to discussions but has difficulty staying on task and completing assignments consistently.

observations.psychologist: Above-average cognitive abilities with significant challenges in sustained attention and executive functioning. Benefits from structured support systems.
